channel.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
channel.description:
Title says , I need help with my Ice blitz:
How would I make it that if I cast ice blitz , I do the emote and right 2-3 Seconds after it shows up the gfx & the hit on the enemy ?
Right now I got it so that I cast it and right at the moment when I cast it , it shows the hit and the gfx.
And I also wanna know how I fix my Crystal bow ?
I <--- can see the green arrow but no one else can .. They see his own arrow but not from other people.
Help me , please.
-gh0st

item.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Well I coded my server , 80 %. There is like 20 % which I didn’t edited yet.

U got team viewer ?

Skype name : r3d_Steven

btw do I have 2 add a new void etc ?

I got this standard barrage so far:

}
            }
if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] > 93)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 4 "+getItemName(560)+", 6 "+getItemName(555)+" and 4 "+getItemName(565));
}
if(playerBonus[3] <= 19)
{
castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10);
startAnimation(1979);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage("get some robes nub.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)&& (playerBonus[3] >= 20))
{
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 1);
hitDiff = 14 + misc.random(16);
NewHP += hitDiff / 6;
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); 
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 4); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Even if i wanted to give you a c+p tut i don’t know which source you have or how it’s coded. Just search around your client for a while, you might learn how your server works and be able to code more and more.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Well I actually don’t know how 2 do it , c&p tut plox ?

btw thnx rep ++ 4 help me [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 02:55:35 pm[/size][hr]Btw I got the standard barrage ( czar ) if that helps…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

It’s fairly simple, just adding 2 variables, the boolean and timer, and moving the attack code around. I’m not going to give you a C+P tut, just search for ‘attack(’ in your client and you’ll eventually find the code, look around for the magic code, replace it with the boolean and put it in process.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Server , ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Off the top of my head have a boolean that turns true whenever you cast the spell and in process() if the boolean’s true it starts a timer, once the timer hits 4-6 (Since most processes run 2x a second) it shows the gfx and damage. As for cbow i haven’t messed with ranging gfx yet so i’m not sure.

Read full topic
